example.name: just transitive
example.text: They concede that much of the government meddling that-1 [*T*-1] torments them is essential to the public good, and even to their own businesses.

example.name: with instrument
example.text: Far from being minimalist, the music unabatingly torments us with apparent novelties not so cleverly disguised in the simplicities of 4/4 time, octave intervals, and ragtime or gospel chord progressions.
